From: Make <info@make.com>
Date: 2025-05-05 23:32:44

( https://www.make.com/?utm_campaign=%E2%9A%A0%EF%B8%8F+Important+Update+on+Customer+Support+for+Free+Plan+Users&utm_medium=email&utm_source=customer.io )
Make Updates
Hey Pa.Sasitheran,

Effective today, we're introducing an important update to the support options available for users on our Free plan.

From now on, Free plan users will have access to our customer support team only for a 90-day complimentary period after signup. After that, ongoing access to expert support will be available exclusively through a paid plan.

 

To ensure a smooth transition, all existing Free plan users will retain access to complimentary support and ticket submission until August 4, 2025.

This adjustment will help us focus our efforts on delivering the highest level of service to our most engaged users.

 

If you’d like to maintain access to direct support after August 4, 2025, please explore our subscription options here ( https://www.make.com/en/pricing?utm_campaign=%E2%9A%A0%EF%B8%8F+Important+Update+on+Customer+Support+for+Free+Plan+Users&utm_medium=email&utm_source=customer.io ). In addition to ongoing support, our paid plans provide a variety of advanced features and benefits.

 

Regardless of your plan, you’ll continue to have access to a wide range of resources and a supportive community ready to assist you.

Available resources

 

●  Make Community ( https://community.make.com/?utm_campaign=%E2%9A%A0%EF%B8%8F+Important+Update+on+Customer+Support+for+Free+Plan+Users&utm_medium=email&utm_source=customer.io ) - Tap into a wealth of collective knowledge with countless solved issues and answered questions every day. With over 40,000 users, the community thrives on Makers helping and supporting one another. 

 

●  Help Center ( https://help.make.com/?utm_campaign=%E2%9A%A0%EF%B8%8F+Important+Update+on+Customer+Support+for+Free+Plan+Users&utm_medium=email&utm_source=customer.io ) - Access a newly updated hub with clearer navigation and expanded content to quickly solve common issues and explore new features.

 

●  Make Academy ( https://academy.make.com/?utm_campaign=%E2%9A%A0%EF%B8%8F+Important+Update+on+Customer+Support+for+Free+Plan+Users&utm_medium=email&utm_source=customer.io ) - Explore a growing library of tutorials, guided courses, and best practices to help you develop your skills and build confidently at your own pace.

 

You can find everything faster with our smart search, just press ⌘+K (or Ctrl+K) on any page in Make to instantly search across the Help Center, Community, and Academy.

More to explore

 

●  Make Blog ( https://www.make.com/en/blog?utm_campaign=%E2%9A%A0%EF%B8%8F+Important+Update+on+Customer+Support+for+Free+Plan+Users&utm_medium=email&utm_source=customer.io )

●  Make Developer Hub ( https://developers.make.com/?utm_campaign=%E2%9A%A0%EF%B8%8F+Important+Update+on+Customer+Support+for+Free+Plan+Users&utm_medium=email&utm_source=customer.io )

●  Make Webinars ( https://www.make.com/en/webinars?utm_campaign=%E2%9A%A0%EF%B8%8F+Important+Update+on+Customer+Support+for+Free+Plan+Users&utm_medium=email&utm_source=customer.io )
